segments.text: I notice the details in this indoor kitchen illustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area is a total mess with water pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running full blast, no one stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear or see the flood?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading across the floor—disgraceful carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids: boy climbing stool to cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's seconds from collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies like they belong to him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is aiding the theft, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats behind the adult's back—naughty behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a neat garden, mocking the interior sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene boils my blood with all the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching potential harm unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
